attributes.action: Ensure ALL young people receive exam grades in 2021.
attributes.additional_details: Ensure government guidance enables all young people to have their work assessed and grades submitted so that no child is left behind in line with the Children Act 1989.
attributes.background: When exams were cancelled in 2020 thousands of young people were left without grades.When the exams were cancelled test centres refused to submit  grades for private GCSEand A-Level candidates because of government guidance. We demand this government ensure no child is left without grades in 2021

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566425
